description.lang: Aeotec TriSensor is a universal Z-Wave Plus compatible product, consists of temperature, lighting and motion sensors, powered by a CR123A battery. It can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications. By the built-in motion sensor, an alam will be sent to the gateway when the motion sensor is triggered.

Group 1 is lifeline group; all nodes which associated in this group will receive the messages sent by device throughlifeline.CommandClass:COMMAND_CLASS_NOTIFICATION COMMAND_CLASS_SENSOR_BINARY COMMAND_CLASS_SENSOR_MULTILEVEL COMMAND_CLASS_BATTERY COMMAND_CLASS_DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLYCommand:NOTIFICATION_REPORTSENSOR_BINARY_REPORT SENSOR_MULTILEVEL_REPORT BATTERY_REPORT DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY_NOTIFICATION

Group 2 is controlling group, all nodes associated in this group will be controlled through BASIC_SET command by the device when device detects a movement event. Basic Set Value is decided by Configuration Parameter 6.CommandClass:COMMAND_CLASS_BASIC (HomeSecurity)Command:BASIC_SET

Group 3 is controlling group, all nodes associated in this group will be controlled through BASIC_SET command by the device when device detects an ambient temperature alarm (Decided by Configuration Parameter 7).CommandClass:COMMAND_CLASS_BASIC(Temperature)Command:BASIC_SET
